name: Swapped
description:
Click X or M to START!

My first pico-8 and local multiplayer game, built in a day for JimJam #2! With a buddy, fight each other, but no one gets to keep the high ground for long! Or play by yourself, but that's sad :(. Once you or your opponent (or yourself, so so sad) take damage you switch places with each other (or yourself, still sad)!

YouTube - Twitter - Instagram - Patreon

Theme Interpretation: 

this game was built off a variety of ideas in regards to the theme, but overall presents the idea of cycle. In regards to this game, cycling between players.
